observation: I can see the Specter.AI website with a Sign Up button in the header and some Create Account/Get Started buttons visible. There are also form elements for email and password input fields below, but they appear to be positioned quite far down the page. I need to access the signup form to complete the registration flow.
reasoning: As a normal user wanting to sign up, I should click the Sign Up button in the header to access the registration form. This is the most obvious and standard way to begin the signup process.

outcome.visual_observation: The Sign Up button disappeared from the header and was replaced with a red circular button with white text/icon. No sign-up flow interface or modal appeared. The page layout remained essentially the same with purple dashed boxes visible.
outcome.diagnosis: The Sign Up button action did not trigger the expected sign-up flow. Instead of opening a registration form, modal, or navigating to a sign-up page, the button was replaced with a different UI element (red circular button), suggesting the action may have failed or triggered an unexpected state change.
